name: Chromakey
description:
Game not loading? Play it here: http://hermitweb.com/ Created by Hermbit and ForestHerd

WASD / Arrow keys: Move the ship

Left Mouse Button: Shoot

Spacebar: Dash

The green bar indicates your dash charges. Three enemy kills will give you one dash charge.

When you dash, you also switch weapons between the heavy green revolver and the nimble red gatling gun. You will do double damage to enemies of your color. Dash wisely!

Although we were limited in time due to the game jam, we will continue working on this after the contest!
